Please pay attention to the volume.

This is a work of fiction.

If minors purchase paid content,
they must obtain consent from their
legal guardian (such as parents) before purchasing.
目標：H.I.Fで優勝を果たす\n「花のように不屈で、\n 女神のように歌:
Goal: To win the H.I.F.
「Indomitable like a flower, singing like a goddess......」
「Not a single piece missing, shimmering, beautiful......」
「Like a rainbow, we return hope.」
「Because we are――Re;IRIS!」
目標：ユニット内の役割決め\n「一番目立つセンターは、当然、私がやるべき」\n「:
Goal: Deciding roles within the unit
"The most prominent center should obviously be me"
"The one with the cutest face should do it!"
"Seniority rules!"
目標：打倒Begrazia！！\n「いまさらそんなコト\n 聞かないでくださ:
Goal: Beat Begrazia!
「Please don't ask me 
             that question now～」
「No way our producer will lose...
          in a produce competition.」
「Let's win. 
               the four of us.」
目標：続・ユニット内の役割決め\n「あなたを追放して\n 妹を仲間にす:
Goal: Continue deciding roles within the unit
『We'll kick you out
   and bring your sister in』
『Oh, nice idea~♪』
『You have absolutely no sense of camaraderie!!』
目標：食事の価値観を議論\n「栄養があって、味が良くて、\n それで何が不満な:
Goal: Discuss values of meals
『It's nutritious, tastes good,
     what more could you want!?』
『We're not machines!
     We're human...!』
『――Both of you, assume seiza position!』
課題：強い仲間探し\r\n「花海咲季に負けるかのように、\r\n 聞こ:
Task: Searching for Strong Allies
"It sounded like you were challenging Saki Hanami."
"Yes! That's exactly what I said!"
"Wow... She's really bold, isn't she..."
